thread.title: Pakistani actress Saba Qamar, who called Salman Khan 'chichora', reacts to her video going viral
thread.title_full: Pakistani actress Saba Qamar, who called Salman Khan 'chichora', reacts to her video going viral - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Pakistani actress Saba Qamar, who called Salman Khan 'chichora', reacts to her video going viral
text:
Saba Qamar 
Pakistani actress Saba Qamar, who features in Saket Chaudhary's Irrfan Khan-starrer Hindi Medium, was trolled after a previous TV interview of hers went viral.

Emaraan Hashmi 
The video, from an old episode of the Pakistani TV show, Good Morning Zindagi, has Saba talking about Bollywood stars. When asked about marrying Hrithik Roshan, Saba said, "Who is going to marry the father of two kids, he is not my cup of tea."

Salman Khan 
She also responded to questions on Emraan Hashmi's smooch fest on screen by saying, "I do not want mouth cancer, no, no." Saba didn't stop there. On seeing Riteish Deshmukh's picture, she responded, "Look, I'm an A-list actress in Pakistan. I work only with A-listers.

Hrithik Roshan 
" She didn't even spare superstar Salman Khan and termed him a "chhichhora" (loafer). "Bahut chhichhore hai aap! He doesn't follow the choreographer at all. He invents his own styles. Kuch bhi! What is this, man?" she said. The actress later issued a statement, which read, "It was a fun show.

Riteish Deshmukh 
I love and respect the Indian film industry. Salman Khan is such a huge star and so humble."
